---
title: "Manage roles & permissions"
---

These steps guide you through the process of configuring and overseeing roles and permissions in the {{< var vm_platform >}}. By carefully defining what users can and cannot do, you can ensure that the right individuals have the appropriate level of access to resources and can perform the correct actions. 

## Prerequisites

To perform these steps, you must be a group administrator or a superuser. 

## Add roles

To add a new role:

1. [Log in to the {{< var vm_platform >}}]({{< var vm_url >}}).

1. Click **Settings**.

{{< include _manage-roles-and-permissions-roles.qmd >}}

## Manage permissions

To manage the permissions for existing roles:

1. [Log in to the {{< var vm_platform >}}]({{< var vm_url >}}).

2. Click **Settings**.

{{< include _manage-roles-and-permissions-permissions.qmd >}}

::: {.callout-tip}
Be careful when modifying permissions to ensure they align with the role's intended responsibilities and access requirements.
:::
